Headline: #8A South Halsted Temporary Reroute at Halsted/Vincennes
ShortDescription: 8A South Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, Vincennes, 83rd and Halsted due to, street blockage near Halsted/Vincennes.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#8A South Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Halsted, Vincennes, 83rd and Halsted due to, street blockage near Halsted/Vincennes.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Normal Yellow Line Service Being Restored
ShortDescription: Yellow Line Svc has resumed following an earlier medical emergency on the tracks at Dempster-Skokie. Allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section: Service on the Yellow Line has resumed following an earlier medical emergency on the tracks at Dempster-Skokie. Trains are moving and normal service is being restored. Allow extra travel time.
